row.name: JOBI.GETPW_DBTOOLS
row.description: Liest verschl√ºsseltes PW aus Login Obekt

row.process:
:PRINT "[START JOBI.GETPW_DBTOOLS]=============================" :SET &LC_ORAUSER# = str_lc(&ORAUSER#) :SET &LC_ORADB# = str_lc(&ORADB#)
! Use dedicated passwords for some specific databases :SET &DedicatedDB# = get_var(VARA.GETPW.SQLPLUS,&LC_ORADB#) :IF &DedicatedDB# <> "" : SET &LC_ORAUSER# = '&LC_ORAUSER#-&LC_ORADB#' :ENDIF
! Read encrypted password from login object :SET &ORA_PASSWD# = GET_LOGIN("LOGIN.SQL.SQLPLUS","&LC_ORAUSER#",SQLPLUS,PASSWORD)
! Decrypt password and put it into shell variable for use in older jobs and includes ORA_PASSWD=$(&UC_JOBMD CMD='echo &ORA_PASSWD#')
! To make sure having an empty space after &ORA_PASSWD# variable in further scripts! :SET &ORA_PASSWD# = '&ORA_PASSWD# ' :PRINT "==============================[ENDE JOBI.GETPW_DBTOOLS]"
